metadata.name: LiveKD Driver Creation By Uncommon Process
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver by a process image other than "livekd.exe".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(file.path) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\drivers\\\\livekdd.sys') AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\livekd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\livek64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver by a process image other than "livekd.exe".

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrators might rename LiveKD before its usage which could trigger this. Add additional names you use to the filter Reference: Internal Research
